body.text:
On my quest for better performanceâ€¦
I now use a canvas gradient texture 1x16 to control the terrain color (which I use in almost every shaders for light bouncing) instead of mixing between colors https://t.co/41jBaJUpYb

body.text:
debug mode showing...
- colors are randomly generated using poline
- streaming mode has less roughness than waiting
- tick based animation as assistant message streams in
- colors shift as thread length increases https://t.co/6iah9AVaj3
